definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Chen Qiufa was appointed Deputy Secretary of CPC Party Leadership Group of Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.
sentences.chinese: 陈求发任工业和信息化部党组副书记。

sentences.english: To undertake other tasks assigned by the leading Party group of the Ministry and Central Communist Youth League.
sentences.chinese: 承办部党组和团中央交办的其他工作。

sentences.english: To this end it is necessary to establish grass-roots party organizations in the Democratic leadership team evaluation system.
sentences.chinese: 为此，必须建立基层党组织领导班子民主测评制度。

sentences.english: Now, Sun Wensheng has been appointed national secretary of the party group.
sentences.chinese: 现在，孙文盛已经被任命为国土资源部党组书记。

sentences.english: The Party organization is composed of the advanced elements of the proletariat.
sentences.chinese: 党组织是由无产阶级先进分子组成的。

sentences.english: The group plays the role of the core of leadership.
sentences.chinese: 党组发挥领导核心作用。

sentences.english: Wan Haichuan was appointed Member of Party Leadership Group of the People's Government of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 任命弯海川为新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府党组成员。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the secretarial work for the leaders of the Party Group and ministers.
sentences.chinese: 负责部党组和部领导的秘书工作。

sentences.english: To strengthen the self building of party organizations at various level of Commission;
sentences.chinese: 加强全委各级党组织的自身建设。

sentences.english: Xu Runlong was appointed Member of the Party Leadership Group of the Health Department of Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 任命徐润龙同志为浙江省卫生厅党组成员。

sentences.english: Part of China became the representative of leading architectural associations congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 汪光焘代表部党组对中国建筑装饰协会表示祝贺。

sentences.english: A leading Party members' group must accept the leadership of the Party organization that approves its establishment. Article 48.
sentences.chinese: 党组必须服从批准它成立的党组织领导。

sentences.english: A leading Party members' group must accept the leadership of the Party organization that approves its establishment. Article 48.
sentences.chinese: 党组必须服从批准它成立的党组织领导。

sentences.english: Second, the grassroots party-building work to adapt to the needs of production.
sentences.chinese: 二是与党组织工作制度的不相适应。

sentences.english: To overtake other tasks assigned by the Party Working Committee of Central Government Departments and the leading Party group of the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 承担中央国家机关党工委和部党组交办的其他工作。

sentences.english: Some Party organizations are feeble and lax.

definition: leading small group (LSG), a CCP body that exercises general oversight on matters relating to a specific area (LSG for foreign affairs 外事工作, LSG for comprehensively deepening reforms 全面深化改革 etc)/aka central leading group

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Jian3 cha2 yuan4

definition: secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)/abbr. for 統一戰線工作部|统一战线工作部[Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4]
